title: [LFT] Silver 3/2 Aussie Bloke Looking for a Late-Night Team
body:
Looking for a team to join that plays most of their ranked games at night, pref. after 10:30pm due to work commitments.

Main Support and Mid (Even experience with both)

Main Champs of Thresh/Leona/Viktor/Lux.  << They not only champs, just my most powerful/knowledgeable of.

Hit me up in game or through this post if I sound like someone that you might want. Open to all and any forms of communication.

replies.body: ill play anytime hit me up my 5s team disbanded so I need of another one add me 5CG One Ear top lane main plat 5
Im also interested if you are making a team although i can play during the day best times for me are usually 10 pm and later feel free to add me on hashshashin

I am currently building a casual team

Trying to find a time that everyone can play **at least** once a week. If that interests you?
Free pretty much every day, but after 10:30.  There are occasions during the day that I can play, but those vary

hey man would you like to start a team with me??
IGN: OnMaccasWIFI
Role: top/jungle
Rank: silver 5
I would prefer late night gaming as well
